Heading: Parent’s marital status
Value: Divorced when Middleton was 11 years old

Heading: Family event
Value:
His parents divorced when he was 11. His mother 
remarried two years later His mother died in 1987. (that is when Middleton began to drink more and become more sexually aggressive—as reported from his 1st wife, Julia “Tina” Heridia)

Heading: Age of family event
Value: 11-13 (Divorce and remarry)mother died when he was 26

Heading: Father’s occupation
Value: Police Officer at Tufts University in Boston

Heading: Highest degree
Value: Started at Suffolk on basketball scholarship then transferred to University of Massachusetts and quit in December 1981

Heading: Grades in school
Value: Good in elementary years, unknown after that

Heading: IQ
Value: Unknown (thought to be above average intelligence)

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Value: Yes, worked as police cadet all throughout college

Heading: Worked in law enforcement?
Value:
Yes, started in Boston police force in Boston then 
transferred to Miami-Dade in Jan 1982, resigned in 1990 after charges of rape and sexual assault of a 16 year old, did 2 years of a 5 year sentence

Heading: Marital status
Value: In common law marriage with Evonne Haley

Heading: Number of children
Value: He has a son and daughter with his first wife. He never tried to contact them after he left Miami. Evonne Haley had a son and daughter, Middleton’s stepkids

Heading: Lives with his children
Value: Lived with stepdaughter, stepson was in Colorado

Heading: Committed previous crimes?
Value: Rape and sexual assault in Florida

Heading: Spend time in prison?
Value: Yes, 2 years of a 5 year sentence

Heading: Number of victims
Value: 1 rape (convicted) 2 murder (convicted) unknown of how many all together

Heading: Victim type
Value: small, petite women (resembling his mothers build)

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Date of first kill in series
Date of final kill in series
Type of victim
Value: Petite women, similar to the one he raped in Florida, also similar to mother

Heading: Method of killing
Value: Blunt force trauma, strangulation, and torture

Heading: Weapon
Value: Ropes to bound victim, used hands to strangle, knives and whips for torture

Heading: Type of serial killer
Value: Organized lust and domination, sexual torture

Heading: Location of killing
Value:
Torture shed for Reno victims, Middleton’s apartment for Buffy Donahue (according to Haley it was an “accident that occurred in the woods”, but an eyewitness saw 
Middleton carrying out a body sized trash bag the night of Donahue’s murder)

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Value: Possibly for Donahue, no for Powell and Davilla

Heading: Victim abducted or killed at contact?

Behavior During Crimes       Raped and used bondage. He held victims captive in refrigerators and speaker box in his storage unit. He came back several times over a few days to torture and rape. Then used trash bags, plastic wrap, rope, and sleeping bags to conceal victims’ body for disposal.
Overkill?
Value: Yes, torture before murder, took special care to hide victims

Heading: After Death Behavior      Tediously concealed and wrapped the victim’s body and buried or hid them.
Sex with the body?
Value: Possibly, not confirmed due to decomposition of body

Heading: Mutilated body?
Value: Some, didn’t sever limbs but torture was severe

Heading: Disposal of Body                Disposed bodies by burying them in isolated areas. Dumped one body in a dumpster outside of an apartment complex, others in the woods.
Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Date killer arrested
Value:
2/23/95 (arrested on a gun charge, held for murder 
charges after bodies were discovered while he was in jail)

Heading: Date convicted
Value: 5/17/95 convicted for gun charge, 6/22/95 charged with murder, 8/26/97 convicted
